Title: Provides a filing extension for the "enhanced" STAR exemption to eligible applicants
Summary: Provides a filing extension for the "enhanced" STAR exemption to initial applicants provided that such applicants have not been granted such extension before and such applicants are otherwise entitled to the exemption.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to providing a filing extension for the "enhanced" STAR exemption to eligible applicants
